definition: at or toward the rear of the stage, remote in manner, the rear part of the stage, steal the show, draw attention to oneself away from someone else
details:
adverb
- at or toward the rear of the stage
= example: at or toward the rear of the stage
adjective
- remote in manner
= synonyms: aloof
- of the back half of a stage
= example: of the back half of a stage
noun
- the rear part of the stage
verb
- steal the show, draw attention to oneself away from someone else
= example: steal the show, draw attention to oneself away from someone else
- move upstage, forcing the other actors to turn away from the audience
- treat snobbishly, put in one's place
